original_title: Jaffna International Trade Fair 2023, a success
original_body_lines: The 13th edition of the Jaffna International Trade Fair 2023 was concluded successfully in Jaffna last Sunday. The Chief Guest was Jeevan Thiagarajah – Governor, Northern Province. The event was organized by Lanka Exhibition & Conference Services (Pvt) Ltd (LECS), in association with the Chamber of Commerce & Industries of Yarlpanam (CCIY). The three-day exhibition provided a major boost to the industries and the economy of Jaffna and was attended by over 50,000 visitors.
